TopicTitle: The Polaris Shuttle Powered Flight Test

Articles.Content:
I recently build a new shuttle to replace my old shuttle the antaries shuttle which was hard to pilot in the atmosphere, This shuttle which i named polaris is going to be the first of many shuttle's i am going to build and fly in the upcoming videos

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hLJ8yNgDpMM&feature=g-upl

I'm going to be making 3 more shuttles after this one and i need some help with names :S can you guys suggest some for the diffrent types of shuttles ive listed below

1st Shuttle - Polaris

2nd Shuttle (Cargo Shuttle) -

3rd Shuttle (Lander)

4th Shuttle (General Orbiter)

Thanks For The Help

Unless you want to keep with the star themes, I think 'Venture' would be a good name for the Lander shuttle.

VentureStar was an abandoned NASA program for a Single Stage To Orbit reusable spacecraft to replace the Shuttles. The more you know
Im going to look into that, it sounds cool
